participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and empathetic, enjoys deep conversations.
participant_1.background: I am a stay-at-home dad. I've a son who is in junior high school. I spent a decade working in the human services field. Horror movies are my favorites.

participant_2.name: Jessica
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and energetic, loves social gatherings.
participant_2.background: I am a party animal. I'm deathly afraid of heights. I help out at the food bank occasionally. I own a cat and a dog.
